metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3117 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> seems like it is a duplicate for CVE-2023-3390. will likely be rejected.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
